messages.content: TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

British counter-terrorism police were monitoring events after media reports of a blast on a train in west London. The investigation into the incident is being led by transport police, a security source said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Flames engulfed one carriage and raced along a train on a west London route. Passengers were forced to trample others as they rushed for an exit, eyewitness says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
British police advise people to avoid the area near Parsons Green, a west London underground station. Media reports of a blast on a train.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Ambulance service sends hazardous area response team to Parsons Green metro station. London transport authority extends suspension of underground line through station.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A woman at London s Parsons Green underground train station says she was injured in a stampede. Armed police were at the scene, a Reuters photographer said. A blast on an underground train at Parsons Green left some passengers with facial burns.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
North Korea fired a missile that flew over Japan into the Pacific Ocean. Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson tweeted: "UK and international community will stand together"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The emphasis on curbing North Korea s missile and nuclear capabilities should not come at the expense of pushing for a peaceful and diplomatic resolution. North Korea fired a missile that flew over Japan s northern Hokkaido island far out into the Pacific Ocean.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Only 43 of the parliament s 349 members supported the motion. Had Lofven lost, the government would have resigned, just a year before a general election. Two ministers have resigned over the potential leak of sensitive data.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov held a phone call with his American counterpart Rex Tillerson. Lavrov and Tillerson spoke late on Thursday and discussed cooperation in their attempts to resolve the Syrian crisis.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

South Korean President Moon Jae-in said North Korea's latest launch will only result in further diplomatic and economic isolation for the North. Officials said Moon had also warned of possible new threats. Moon ordered officials to closely analyze and prepare for new possible North Korean threats.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Abe says international community must send a clear message to North Korea. North Korea fired a missile on Friday that flew over Japan s northern Hokkaido.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.N. Security Council will meet at 3 p.m. EDT (1900 GMT) on Friday on the latest North Korea missile test. North Korea fired a missile that flew over Japan s northern Hokkaido far out into the Pacific Ocean.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson urges China and Russia to take direct action against North Korea. He said China supplies North Korea with most of its oil and Russia is the largest employer of North Korean forced labor.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
South Korea says it is fully prepared to respond against any North Korean threat. Foreign ministry says it would boost its response ability against Pyongyang s provocations.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis says North Korea's missile launch put millions of Japanese into duck and cover. He added that top U.N. officials had fully coordinated after the test-launch.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

North Korea fired a missile on Friday that flew over Japan s northern Hokkaido far out into the Pacific Ocean. Japanese Foreign Minister Taro Kono said he thinks the missile was an intercontinental ballistic missile.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

North Korea fired a ballistic missile over Japan on Friday morning. Japan strongly protested against what it called Pyongyang s latest intolerable provocation. The missile was launched at 6:57 a.m. Japan time (2157 GMT) and flew over Hokkaido.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Brazilian President Michel Temer was hit with fresh graft charges on Thursday. He was charged by Prosecutor General Rodrigo Janot with obstruction of justice and racketeering. They accused Temer of taking bribes in return for political favors.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Office of Brazil s Prosecutor-General Rodrigo Janot asked the Federal Supreme Court to convert the temporary detention of Joesley Batista into preventative detention.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

General Valery Gerasimov, the chief of Russia s general staff, told Curtis Scaparrotti, a U.S general who is NATO Supreme Allied Commander in Europe, that Moscow s latest military exercise was purely defensive. The exercise, codenamed  Zapad , or  West, began on Thursday and will last until Sept. 20.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump said he would visit Japan, South Korea and China in November. Trump added that the trip would possibly include Vietnam for the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) conference. Trump noted he had been invited to the U.S-ASEAN summit in the Philippines.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The three men, aged 20, 22 and 25, were arrested last February while trying to enter Turkey from Bulgaria. They were accused of attempting to join Islamic State in Syria. The men, who had obtained refugee status in Germany, denied any wrongdoing.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump says Iran is violating the spirit of the Iran nuclear deal. He stopped short of saying whether he will refuse to recertify the agreement. Trump called the Iran deal negotiated by former President Barack Obama,  one of the worst deals I have ever seen.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson meets with British foreign minister Boris Johnson. "Please know that you have a steadfast ally in the United States," he says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. accuses Iran of involvement in either malicious cyber activities or enabling Tehran's ballistic missile program. Action freezes any assets they may hold in the United States and prohibits them from doing business with them.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Support for Germany s center-left Social Democrats (SPD) has slumped to its lowest level this year. Support for Merkel s CDU/CSU bloc unchanged at 37 percent, with the SPD dipping one percentage point to 20 percent.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Najmaddin Kareem condemned a vote by Iraq s parliament on Thursday to remove him from office as unlawful. Decision to remove Kareem came after Kirkuk voted to take part in a referendum set for Sept. 25 on Kurdish independence.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Kurdish President Massoud Barzani condemned the vote by Iraq s parliament to remove the governor of Kirkuk from office. Kirkuk - an oil-rich province claimed by both the central government in Baghdad and the autonomous Kurdish region - voted to take part in a referendum set for Sept. 25 on Kurdish independence.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Kurdish leaders will study a western delegation s plan to delay the autonomous region s planned referendum on independence. The delegation is concerned that the timing of the vote could disrupt the coalition s drive against Islamic State. But hours later, Barzani told those gathered that they would vote on Sept. 25 as planned, according to local media.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Brett McGurk, the U.S. special envoy to the coalition against Islamic State, said he was encouraged that the Iraqi Kurdish leadership could embrace a plan to delay an independence referendum. Moving forward with the referendum on Sept. 25 would be a  risky  move for Iraq s autonomous Kurdish region, he said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
In July, rival leaders pledged in Paris to work towards elections in 2018 and a conditional ceasefire. U.N. Libya envoy Ghassan Salame said constitutional and electoral laws would have to be written.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. government is continuing to develop its policy on Iran. It will consider the wider threat it poses beyond its nuclear capabilities. In April, President Donald Trump ordered a review of the 2015 nuclear deal.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Islamic State claims suicide attacks that killed at least 50 people and injured more than 80. The attacks targeted a restaurant and a checkpoint, killing dozens of Shi ites.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Kremlin says it is hunting for those behind what it called a campaign of telephone terrorism. Tens of thousands of people have been evacuated from buildings across the country in the last few days. Authorities evacuated people from dozens of buildings in Moscow on Wednesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

At least 19 people drowned and 10 are missing after a boat capsized in the Yamuna river. The boat was carrying 40 people, many more than its capacity of 25. Eleven people were rescued and were admitted to a government hospital.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Turkey says it expects humanitarian aid could be delivered to Syria's Idlib province. Idlib is under the control of a rebel alliance spearheaded by the former al Qaeda offshoot Nusra Front. Turkey said last month it was limiting the movement of non-humanitarian aid into Idlib.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Turkey remains a dependable member of the NATO alliance, President Tayyip Erdogan s spokesman says. Western allies expressed concern over Ankara s decision to procure a missile defence system from Russia.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Kurdish official says parliament has no right to remove Kirkuk governor from office. Kirkuk voted to take part in a referendum set for Sept. 25 on Kurdish independence.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The missiles were fired from two submarines in the eastern Mediterranean from a distance of 500-670 kilometers (727 miles) The targets were command posts, communication centers and militants weapons and ammunition stockpiles.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Iraqi parliament votes to remove the governor of Kirkuk from office. Move follows request from Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi. Kirkuk is an oil-rich province claimed by both the central government in Baghdad.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

South Korean President Moon Jae-in said on Thursday he was against bringing nuclear weapons into his country. Introducing nuclear weapons in South Korea would make it impossible for the two Koreas to establish peace.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Incident occurred at the Yuchen coal mine, which has 60,000 tonnes of annual production capacity. Latest accident follows announcement by China s State Council on Aug. 31 to launch a new round of safety checks.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.N. Security Council expresses deep concern about violence in Myanmar s Rakhine state. About 400,000 Rohingya Muslims have been forced to flee to Bangladesh. 15-member council expresses concern about reports of excessive violence.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The No. 3 U.S. railroad also said engineering crews worked through the night to restore service in Georgia, South Carolina and Alabama. Customers should expect delays as backlogs are worked down.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A woman has been arrested in London on suspicion of attempted burglary. Prince George, the great-grandson of Queen Elizabeth, attends the school. The 40-year-old woman was arrested on Wednesday in relation to an incident.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

European Commission chief Jean-Claude Juncker s speech on the state of the European Union contained many ambitious proposals chiming with French ideas. French presidency official said Juncker had opened up options.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. military says it carried out air strikes in Somalia against an al Qaeda-allied Islamist group. The group, al Shabaab, is fighting to topple Somalia s Western-backed transitional federal government. AlShabaab has lost control of most of Somalia s cities and towns since it was pushed out of Mogadishu in 2011.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
China will step up monitoring of abnormal cross-border capital movements. China will implement U.N. Security Council resolutions against terrorism financing.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

British Prime Minister Theresa May has spoken with the leaders of Northern Ireland's two main parties. Northern Ireland s Democratic Unionist Party (DUP) and Sinn Fein have failed so far to agree on how to reform the devolved administration.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Five crew members of a Dominican-registered dredger are missing after a collision. The missing include four Chinese nationals and one Malaysian. Seven other Chinese nationals have been rescued. The dredger capsized and is currently partially submerged.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Moscow does not want to escalate the situation around U.S. diplomats in Russia, official says. Deputy Foreign Minister Sergei Ryabkov says Moscow is not currently planning to further reduce the number of diplomatic staff in Russia.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson believes the diplomatic tiff between Russia and the United States should not be escalated further. He hopes the two countries can begin working to improve ties, a State Department spokeswoman said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The government won by 320 votes to 301, a day after lawmakers passed legislation to sever ties with the European Union. May lost the Conservatives  majority in a June election.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump will travel to Florida later this week, the White House says. The administration continues to monitor the damage from Hurricanes Irma and Harvey.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Catalan police declare a false alarm on Tuesday following a bomb scare. Agents cordon off Barcelona s Sagrada Familia church and send in a bomb squad. Police say there had been no arrests as a result of the incident.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump scheduled to speak with Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto. White House spokeswoman Sarah Sanders said a telephone call was scheduled to take place within the hour. At least 96 people were killed in last week's earthquake.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Iraqi Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi described the Kurdistan region s planned referendum on independence as unconstitutional. Abadi called upon the Kurdish leadership to come to Baghdad and conclude a dialogue.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Riot police clash with hooded youths on the fringe of a protest in central Paris. Police fired water canons and could be seen dragging several demonstrators behind their lines.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Syrian government forces have to date cleared 85 percent of the country s area from militants. Islamic State fighters are still in control of around 27,000 square km of Syria s territory.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Russian Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu met with Syrian President Bashar al-Assad. They discussed military cooperation between Russia and Syria, news agencies reported.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The UK and the European Commission have today jointly agreed to start the fourth round of negotiations on September 25. Both sides settled on the date after discussions between senior officials in recognition that more time for consultation would give negotiators the flexibility to make progress.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump said fresh sanctions on North Korea were just a small step and  nothing compared to what ultimately will have to happen. "I don t know if it has any impact, but certainly it was nice to get a 15 to nothing vote," he said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump said he and Malaysian Prime Minister Najib Razak are discussing large trade pacts and a deal involving Boeing jets. Najib said he would like to invest in Trump s infrastructure program.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Norfolk Southern has opened origin facility gates for shipments destined to Charleston, South Carolina. But gates remained closed to traffic destined for Jacksonville, Florida, Savannah-Garden City in Georgia, and Florida East Coast Railway locations.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
EU and Britain agreed to delay the talks by a week to Sept. 25, diplomats said. Diplomats said expectations that May would make important speech on the subject on Sept. 21.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Customs agency HMRC is preparing for all eventualities, including for a no-deal scenario, Philip Hammond says. Hammond says government seeking smoothest possible customs arrangements as part of a negotiated exit from the EU.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
FPL expects to restore power on the eastern side of Florida by this weekend. The harder hit western part of the state by Sept. 22. FPL is a unit of Florida energy company NextEra Energy Inc.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

German Foreign Minister Sigmar Gabriel said on Monday Berlin had put most arms exports to Turkey on hold due to deteriorating human rights in Turkey. Turkish Foreign Minister Mevlut Cavusoglu said Gabriel's comments were not appropriate for a foreign minister.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov and U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson will meet on the sidelines of the U.N. General Assembly.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

German Chancellor Angela Merkel rejects a total ban on arms exports to Turkey. Merkel says Turkey remained a key ally in the fight against Islamic State. Foreign Minister Sigmar Gabriel said Berlin had put most arms exports on hold.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
A policeman was stabbed to death on Tuesday in Valencia, eastern Spain. The attacker was shot dead. Police do not believe the attack was connected to Islamist militants.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin says he will seek new financial sanctions on Beijing. China agreed to historic sanctions on North Korea on Monday in a UN Security Council vote. If China doesn't follow these sanctions, we will put additional sanctions on them, he said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Poland given one month to address concerns over a judiciary overhaul or face court challenge. Critics say reforms undermine the independence of the courts. Commission opened legal proceedings against the nationalist government in Warsaw.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Five million to 6 million power customers lack electricity after Hurricane Irma. About 15 million people without power, federal emergency officials say.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Britain says it is unconditionally committed to maintaining European security. Document sets out details of the relationship it wants to have with the European Union.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Kurdish parliament will definitely have a response to the resolution when it convenes on Thursday. Hoshyar Zebari, former Iraqi foreign and finance minister, said Kurdish lawmakers would convene for first time since October 2015.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

An estimated 370,000 Rohingya Muslim refugees have fled to Bangladesh. Myanmar says its security forces are fighting Rohingya militants behind a surge of violence. Many of the refugees say Myanmar authorities are intent on pushing Rohingya out.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. ambassador to Cambodia rejects government accusations of interference. Ambassador William Heidt calls for the immediate release of opposition leader Kem Sokha. Prime Minister Hun Sen has charged Sokha with treason, accusing him of conspiring to take power.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Turkish police detained 25 suspected Islamic State militants in operations across Istanbul. Three of the suspects were high-level members of the militant group, Anadolu said. Ankara has detained more than 5,000 Islamic State suspects.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

South Korea welcomes a new U.N. Security Council resolution imposing additional sanctions on North Korea. South Korea says the only way for Pyongyang to escape isolation and economic hardship is to end its nuclear program.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Parliament due to hold a late-night vote on whether to let the EU withdrawal bill move to the next stage of the lawmaking process. Prime Minister Theresa May s government is confident of winning the vote.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The first detachment of 40 de-miners has already been deployed to Russia s Hmeimim air base in Syria. Syrian government forces and U.S.-backed militias converged on Islamic State in separate offensives against the militants.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Abe says Japan wants to exercise leadership to bring about change in Pyongyang s policies. U.N. Security Council unanimously stepped up sanctions against North Korea on Monday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The White House says the violent displacement of Rohingya Muslims in Myanmar showed the country s security forces were not protecting civilians. We call on Burmese security authorities to respect the rule of law, stop the violence, and end the displacement of civilians from all communities.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

UK lawmakers vote in favor of legislation to sever political, financial and legal ties with the European Union. Opposition Labour Party said several clauses in the legislation amount to a power grab by government.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Many had complained that the eight days set out by the government for line-by-line scrutiny of the EU withdrawal bill was not long enough for such an important piece of legislation. Lawmakers voted by 318 to 301 to support the so-called program motion.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Tropical Storm Irma is expected to bring strong crosswinds to the Atlanta hub. The No. 2 U.S. airline said it was planning to resume service to airports in Florida.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

White House homeland security adviser Tom Bossert says it may take weeks before many residents are able to return to the Florida Keys. Bossert said possible damage to bridges caused by Hurricane Irma.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Norway s tax-cutting Prime Minister Erna Solberg is on track to keep power after an election. The ruling coalition of the Conservatives and Progress Party would win 88 seats in the 169-seat parliament.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
EPA says it will exercise its enforcement discretion for all power plants in Florida. It said in a statement the no-action assurance will end on Sept. 26.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Russian Deputy Foreign Minister Sergei Ryabkov urged U.S. Undersecretary of State Thomas Shannon to stop destroying Russia-U.N. relations. Ryabakov and Shannon met in Helsinki.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

YRC Worldwide Inc said it had multiple terminals closed in Georgia, South Carolina, and Florida due to Irma. The closed terminals included locations in Atlanta, Valdosta and Albany, in Georgia; Charleston, Columbia, and Florence, in  South Carolina.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Douglas Hammersley is thought to be the oldest person convicted of a crime in Britain. He was given a two-year suspended sentence after pleading guilty to three counts of indecent assault. In December, a 101-year-old man was jailed for a string of historical sex crimes.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The bomb was concealed in a car parked on Al Mukaram street in the capital, Mohamed Hussein, a police officer, said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

There was agreement that the conflict about North Korea s nuclear armament must be resolved peacefully, a spokesman said. Merkel told Putin she supported efforts of the U.N. Security Council to rapidly adopt further sanctions against North Korea.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Vladimir Putin tells German Chancellor Angela Merkel that UN peacekeepers might be deployed to eastern Ukraine. Putin gave her a detailed description of Russia s initiative to establish a UN mission to protect observers.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A suicide bomber in an explosives-packed vehicle attacked a NATO convoy in Afghanistan. A small number of foreign troops and at least three civilians were wounded. Taliban militants said 13 Americans had been killed and 11 wounded. Attack came on the 16th anniversary of the attacks of September 11, 2001.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian President Vladimir Putin and German Chancellor Angela Merkel discussed the situation on the Korean peninsula. They strongly condemned Pyongyang s ignoring of U.N. Security Council resolutions. The leaders agreed to continue contacts on the crisis via their foreign ministers.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Around 30 people were injured in a train collision at a station in central Switzerland. None of the injuries are life-threatening, police for the Swiss canton of Uri said. The accident occurred in Andermatt, a town in the Swiss Alps popular among skiers.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The top U.N. human rights official voiced concern on Monday at the Trump administration s decision to end the DACA program. Zeid Ra ad al-Hussein urged the U.S. Congress to give them lasting legal status in the country.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Mexico's Foreign Minister Luis Videgaray will travel to the United States this week. He will meet with local leaders and beneficiaries of the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals program.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Florida Power & Light shut Unit 4 at the Turkey Point nuclear power station in Florida Sunday night due to a likely valve issue. The company is reducing power at Unit 1 at the St Lucie power plant due to salt build up in the switchyard.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Venezuela rejects as baseless reports by U.N. human rights office that found grave violations by its security forces against protesters. Foreign Minister Jorge Arreaza: Opposition in Venezuela is back on the path of rule of law and democracy.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Federal officials are focused on search and rescue operations and restoring power. 200,000 people remained in shelters and more than 5 million were without power. daylight revealed the damage from the storm overnight.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Halimah Yacob was set to become the city-state s first woman president. Other candidates did not qualify for the contest. The largely ceremonial post had been reserved this year for candidates from the ethnic Malay minority.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

China reiterates call for more steps by the U.N. Security Council. U.S.-drafted resolution originally called for an oil embargo on the North. North Korea drew global condemnation for its sixth nuclear test on Sept 3.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

South Korean Foreign Minister Kang Kyung-wha says North Korea is on a reckless path. Her comments come hours before the U.N. Security Council was to vote on fresh a U.S.-drafted resolution imposing new sanctions.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

South Korean Foreign Minister Kang Kyung-wha says North Korea is on a reckless path. Her comments come hours before the U.N. Security Council was to vote on fresh a U.S.-drafted resolution imposing new sanctions.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Cambodian Prime Minister Hun Sen threatens to dissolve main opposition party. Hun Sen says Cambodia National Rescue Party would be dissolved if it continues to back detained leader. Kem Sokha was arrested on Sept. 3 and accused of plotting against the government.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Most outages were in Florida Power & Light s service area in the southern and eastern parts of the state. As the storm moved up the coast, Duke Energy s outages steadily climbed.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Irma is forecast to weaken into a tropical storm over far northern Florida or southern Georgia on Monday. The Category 2 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson wind scale was about 50 miles southeast of Tampa, Florida.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

American Airlines Group Inc will not resume commercial flights at its Miami airport hub on Monday. The airline said earlier on Sunday it planned to begin limited operations on Monday after 5 p.m. (2100 GMT) The Miami airport said it would remain closed on Monday and may reopen on Tuesday. All American flights remain canceled through Monday at 12 other Florida airports.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The declaration means residents and businesses can apply for grants for temporary housing and home repairs. The federal government will also reimburse counties for emergency protective measures including evacuation and sheltering costs.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Grand Hotel in Brighton, where five people were killed by an Irish Republican Army bombing during the Conservative Party conference in 1984, was evacuated. The nearby Brighton Centre, where the TUC was meeting, was also evacuated. Military ordnance disposal are attending as part of the search.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The declaration will authorizes federal funding to come to the state to assist local and state agencies with response and recovery. The White House has not yet announced the declaration.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump calls Hurricane Irma a big monster. He said the storm would cost a lot of money but that the federal government was focused on saving lives.
